TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件的 SQL 数据库。

span.span: Represents an SQL database to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [数据连接Data Connections](#data_connections) - [执行数据操作Performing Data Operations](#performing_data_operations) - [数据访问接口Data Provider](#data_provider) - [缓存Caching](#caching) - [其他功能Additional Features](#additional_features) - [数据源视图Data Source View](#data_source_view) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 数据源控件将 SQL 关系数据库中的数据表示为数据绑定控件。The data source control represents data in an SQL relational database to data-bound controls. 您可以将 控件与数据绑定控件结合使用，以便从关系数据库中检索数据，并在几乎不包含任何代码的情况下对网页上的数据进行显示、编辑和排序。You can use the control in conjunction with a data-bound control to retrieve data from a relational database and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page with little or no code. ## 数据连接Data Connections 若要连接到数据库，必须将 属性设置为有效的连接字符串。To connect to a database, you must set the property to a valid connection string. 可以支持任何可使用 ADO.NET 提供程序连接到的 SQL 关系数据库，如 `SqlClient`、`OleDb`、`Odbc`或 `OracleClient` 提供程序。The can support any SQL relational database that can be connected to using an ADO.NET provider, such as the `SqlClient`, `OleDb`, `Odbc`, or `OracleClient` provider. 有关如何保护连接字符串的信息，请参阅[如何：在使用数据源控件时保护连接字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178372(v=vs.100))。For information about how to secure connection strings, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178372(v=vs.100)). 若要从基础数据库检索数据，请使用 SQL 查询设置 "" 属性。To retrieve data from an underlying database, set the property with an SQL query. 如果与 关联的数据库支持存储过程，则可以将 属性设置为存储过程的名称。If the database that the is associated with supports stored procedures, you can set the property to the name of a stored procedure. 指定的 SQL 查询也可以是参数化查询。The SQL query that you specify can also be a parameterized query. 可以将与参数化查询关联 对象添加到 集合。You can add objects that are associated with a parameterized query to the collection. 有关参数化 SQL 查询及其语法的详细信息，请参阅将[参数用于筛选的数据源控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xt50s8kz(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and their syntax, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xt50s8kz(v=vs.100)). 只要调用 方法， 控件就会检索数据。The control retrieves data whenever the method is called. 此方法提供对 属性指定的方法的编程访问。This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by property. 当调用其 方法时，绑定到 的控件会自动调用 方法。The method is automatically called by controls that are bound to the when their method is called. 如果设置数据绑定控件的 属性，则控件会根据需要自动绑定到数据源中的数据。If you set the property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as required. 设置 `DataSourceID` 属性是将 控件绑定到数据绑定控件的建议方法。Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an control to a data-bound control. 或者，您可以使用 `DataSource` 属性，但随后必须显式调用数据绑定控件的 方法。Alternatively, you can use the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the method of the data-bound control. 可以使用 的数据绑定控件的一些示例包括 、、和 。Some examples of data-bound controls that can use are , , , and . 您可以随时以编程方式调用 方法，以便从基础数据库中检索数据。You can call the method programmatically at any time to retrieve data from the underlying database. 在声明性和编程 ASP.NET 方案中，可以将数据绑定控件的 属性设置为 控件的 ID。In declarative and programmatic ASP.NET scenarios, you can set the property of the data-bound control to the ID of the control. 您还可以将 类的实例分配给数据绑定控件的 属性。You can also assign an instance of the class to the property of the data-bound control. 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Data Access Options](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178359(v=vs.110))。For more information about binding data-bound control to data source controls, see [ASP.NET Data Access Options](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178359(v=vs.110)). ## 执行数据操作Performing Data Operations 根据基础数据库产品的功能和 类的实例的配置，您可以执行数据操作，例如更新、插入和删除。Depending on the capabilities of the underlying database product and the configuration of the instance of the class, you can perform data operations, such as updates, inserts, and deletes. 若要执行这些数据操作，请为要执行的操作设置适当的命令文本和任何关联的参数。To perform these data operations, set the appropriate command text and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform. 例如，对于更新操作，将 属性设置为 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，并将所有必需参数添加到 集合。For example, for an update operation, set the property to an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure and add any required parameters to the collection. 更新是在调用 方法时执行的，无论是通过代码显式调用，还是由数据绑定控件自动执行。The update is performed when the method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control. 和 操作遵循相同的常规模式。The same general pattern is followed for and operations. 可以参数化 、、和 属性中使用的 SQL 查询和命令。The SQL queries and commands that you use in the , , , and properties can be parameterized. 这意味着，查询或命令可以使用占位符而不是文本值，并将占位符绑定到应用程序或用户定义的变量。This means that the query or command can use placeholders instead of literal values and bind the placeholders to application or user-defined variables. 您可以将 SQL 查询中的参数绑定到会话变量，传递到 Web 窗体页的查询字符串的值，其他服务器控件的属性值等。You can bind parameters in SQL queries to Session variables, values that are passed on the query string for a Web Forms page, the property values of other server controls, and more. 有关如何在 中使用 SQL 查询中的参数的详细信息，请参阅将[参数与数据源控件结合使用，以便](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xt50s8kz(v=vs.100))[通过 SqlDataSource 控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))进行筛选和使用参数。For more information about how to use parameters in SQL queries with the , see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xt50s8kz(v=vs.100)) and [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，如果在执行 `Select` 命令时 `null` 其中一个参数，则将不会返回任何数据并且不会引发异常。By default, if one of the parameters is `null` when you execute a `Select` command, no data will be returned and no exception will be thrown. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `false`来更改此行为。You can change this behavior by setting the property to `false`. ## 数据访问接口Data Provider 默认情况下， 控件适用于 SQL Server 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序，但 不是 Microsoft SQL Server 特定的。By default, the control works with the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, but is not Microsoft SQL Server-specific. 您可以将 控件与具有托管 ADO.NET 提供程序的任何数据库产品连接。You can connect the control with any database product for which there is a managed ADO.NET provider. 与 提供程序一起使用时， 可与任何 OLE DB 兼容的数据库一起使用。When used with the provider, the can work with any OLE DB-compliant database. 与 提供程序一起使用时， 可用于任何 ODBC 驱动程序和数据库，包括 IBM DB2、MySQL 和 PostgreSQL。When used with the provider, the can be used with any ODBC driver and database, including IBM DB2, MySQL, and PostgreSQL. 与 提供程序一起使用时， 可用于 Oracle 8.1.7 数据库和更高版本。When used with the provider, the can work with Oracle 8.1.7 databases and later. 允许的提供程序的列表在配置文件的 `DbProviderFactories` 节中注册，无论是在 machine.config 还是 web.config 文件中。The list of allowable providers is registered in the `DbProviderFactories` section of the configuration file, either in the Machine.config or Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 SqlDataSource 控件选择数据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1kdt8w2(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1kdt8w2(v=vs.100)). ## CachingCaching 如果使用 控件在页面上显示数据，则可以使用数据源控件的数据缓存功能提高页面的性能。If you display data on your page using a control, you can increase the performance of the page by using the data caching capabilities of the data source control. 缓存会降低数据库服务器上的处理负载，但会降低 Web 服务器上的内存量;在大多数情况下，这是一个很好的权衡。Caching reduces the processing load on the database servers at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases, this is a good trade-off. 当 属性设置为 `true` 时， 会自动缓存数据， 属性设置为在放弃缓存条目之前缓存存储数据的秒数。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 还可以指定 和可选的 值。You can also specify a and an optional value. ## 其他功能Additional Features 提供了其他功能，如下表所示。The provides additional capabilities, as listed in the following table. |功能Capability|要求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |CachingCaching|根据缓存数据所需的缓存行为，将 属性设置为 值，将 属性设置为 `true`，并将 和 属性设置为。Set the property to the value, the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| |正在删除Deleting|将 属性设置为用于删除数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to delete data. 此语句通常是参数化的。This statement is typically parameterized.| |FilteringFiltering|将 属性设置为 值。Set the property to the value. 将 属性设置为一个筛选表达式，该表达式用于在调用 方法时筛选数据。Set the property to a filtering expression used to filter the data when the method is called.| |插入Inserting|将 属性设置为用于插入数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to insert data. 此语句通常是参数化的。This statement is typically parameterized.| |PagingPaging|目前 不支持，但当您将 属性设置为 值时，某些数据绑定控件（如 ）支持分页。Not currently supported by the , however some data-bound controls, such as , support paging when you set the property to the value.| |选择Selecting|将 属性设置为用于检索数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to retrieve data.| |排序Sorting|将 属性设置为 。Set the property to .| |更新Updating|将 属性设置为用于更新数据的 SQL 语句。Set the property to an SQL statement used to update data. 此语句通常是参数化的。This statement is typically parameterized.| ## “数据源视图”Data Source View 与所有数据源控件一样， 控件与数据源视图类相关联。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a data source view class. 控件只有一个关联 ，并且它始终命名为 "`Table`"。The control has only one associated , and it is always named `Table`. 没有 控件的可视呈现;它以控件的形式实现，以便您可以以声明方式创建它，还可以允许它参与状态管理。There is no visual rendering of the control; it is implemented as a control so that you can create it declaratively and, optionally, to allow it to participate in state management. 因此， 不支持视觉功能，如 或 属性提供的功能。As a result, the does not support visual features, such as the ones that are provided by the or property. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 本部分包含四个代码示例：This section contains four code examples: - 第一个代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法在 控件的 SQL Server 中显示数据。The first code example demonstrates how to display data from SQL Server in a control using declarative syntax. - 第二个代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法在 控件中的与 ODBC 兼容的数据库中显示数据。The second code example demonstrates how to display data from an ODBC-compliant database in a control using declarative syntax. - 第三个代码示例演示如何在 控件中显示和更新数据。The third code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. - 第四个代码示例演示如何在 控件中显示和更新数据。The fourth code example demonstrates how to display and update data in a control. > [!NOTE] > 这些示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 中访问数据](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio). 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用 控件从 SQL Server 中检索数据，并在 控件中显示数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用 控件从与 ODBC 兼容的数据库中检索数据，并在 控件中显示数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control declaratively to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 属性是 的 ODBC .NET Framework 数据提供程序的名称。The property is the name of the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, which is . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/CS/odbc3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3odbc/VB/odbc3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了一个带有 控件的常见显示和更新方案。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the control. 与前面的示例一样，Northwind 数据库中的数据将显示在 控件中。As with the previous examples, data from the Northwind database is displayed in the control. 此外，由于指定了 属性并且 属性设置为 `true`，因此你可以在不使用其他代码的情况下编辑和更新记录。Additionally, because an property is specified and the property is set to `true`, you can edit and update the records with no additional code. 控件会自动处理向 集合添加参数，并在单击 控件中的 "**更新**" 按钮时调用 方法。The control automatically handles adding parameters to the collection and calls the method when the **Update** button in the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/CS/sql5cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_5sql/VB/sql5vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了一个带有 和 控件的常见显示和更新方案。The following code example demonstrates a common display and update scenario with the and controls. 控件不会自动将更新参数添加到 集合或调用 方法，因此必须这样做。The control does not automatically add update parameters to the collection nor call the method, so you must do so. 更新参数以声明方式指定，并且你可以添加一个事件处理程序，以便在引发事件时执行 操作。The update parameters are specified declaratively and you can add an event handler to perform the operation when an event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包括一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同种类的 SQL，因此 `selectCommand` 的语法取决于当前使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax for `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 （这是 类的默认提供程序），则参数的占位符是 `'@parameterName'`的。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果将提供程序设置为 或 ，则参数的占位符 `'?'`为。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据源支持存储过程，则 值可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The value can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数创建 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control using the constructor. 该示例在不常见的情况下， 控件不在 Web 窗体页上使用，而是在中间层对象的实现中作为业务对象与数据库交互的简单方式。The example is unusual in that the control is being used not on a Web Forms page, but in the implementation of a middle-tier object as a simple way for a business object to interact with a database. 该示例使用存储在 web.config 文件中的连接字符串。The example uses a connection string that is stored in the Web.config file. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/northwindemployee1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/northwindemployee1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为不同的数据库产品使用不同种类的 SQL，所以 `selectCommand` 的语法取决于当前使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 `providerName` 参数标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of `selectCommand` depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the `providerName` parameter. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序 （这是 类的默认提供程序），则参数的占位符是 `'@parameterName'`的。For example, if the provider is , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果将提供程序设置为 或 ，则参数的占位符 `'?'`为。However, if the provider is set to the or the , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据源支持存储过程，则 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.

summary.span: 获取或设置以秒为单位的一段时间，它是数据源控件缓存 方法所检索到的数据的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data that is retrieved by the method.

value.span: 缓存 操作结果的秒数。

span.span: The number of seconds that the caches the results of a operation.

value.span: 默认值为 0。
该值不能为负数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 缓存数据时， 方法从缓存而不是基础数据库中检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 缓存过期后， 方法从基础数据库中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 当 属性设置为 `true` 并且 属性设置为大于0的值时， 控件将自动缓存数据，该值指示在丢弃缓存条目之前缓存存储数据的秒数。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值0表示无限长的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 缓存的行为取决于持续时间和 属性的组合。The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the duration and the property. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 会缓存第一个数据检索操作上的数据，最多会将其保存在内存中，最多可为 属性指定的时间量。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by property. 如果需要内存，则数据可能在持续时间之前释放。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is required. 然后，在下一操作期间刷新缓存。The cache is then refreshed during the next operation. 如果 属性设置为 值，则数据源控件将在第一次数据检索操作中缓存数据，但会重置其保存每个后续操作的缓存的时间窗口。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation. 如果自上次 操作后，如果时间与 值相等，则缓存过期。The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the value since the last operation. 只有在 模式下， 控件才能缓存数据。The control can cache data only when it is in mode. 如果 控件设置为 值并且还启用了缓存，则 方法会引发 异常。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 Microsoft Windows 身份验证下的客户端模拟时，将在第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果其他用户请求相同的数据，则从缓存中检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 通过对数据库进行另一次调用以验证用户对数据的访问权限，不会检索数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望有多个用户访问数据，并且希望数据库的安全配置验证每个数据的检索，请不要使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索 Northwind 数据库中的数据，并在启用了数据缓存的情况下将其显示在 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 设置为20秒，因为 属性默认设置为 值，所以此页的用户每隔20秒就会看到最新数据。The is set to 20 seconds and, because the property is set to the value by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 缓存数据时， 方法从缓存而不是基础数据库中检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 缓存过期后， 方法从基础数据库中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 缓存的行为由 和 设置的组合确定。The behavior of the cache is determined by a combination of the and settings. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 会在第一个数据检索操作上缓存数据，并将其保存在内存中，保留 属性指定的时间量，然后在该时间过后放弃该数据。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for the amount of time that is specified by the property, and then discards it after the time has lapsed. 然后，在下一操作期间刷新缓存。The cache is then refreshed during the next operation. 如果 属性设置为 值，则数据源控件将在第一次数据检索操作中缓存数据，但会重置其保存每个后续操作的缓存的时间窗口。If the property is set to the value, the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for each subsequent operation. 如果自上次 操作后，如果时间与 值相等，则缓存过期。The cache expires, if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the value since the last operation. 只有在 模式下， 控件才能缓存数据。The control can cache data only when in the mode. 如果 控件设置为 值并且还启用了缓存，则 方法会引发 异常。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 Microsoft Windows 身份验证下的客户端模拟时，将在第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果其他用户请求相同的数据，则从缓存中检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 通过对数据库进行另一次调用以验证用户对数据的访问权限，不会检索数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望有多个用户访问数据，并且希望数据库的安全配置验证每个数据的检索，请不要使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索 Northwind 数据库中的数据，并在启用了数据缓存的情况下将其显示在 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 由于 属性设置为 值，因此即使 值为20秒，用户也不会看到新数据。Because the property is set to the value, users will not see fresh data even though the value is 20 seconds. 仅当页面上没有任何活动超过20秒后，才会刷新缓存的数据。The cached data is refreshed only if there is no activity on the page for more than 20 seconds since the last page load. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/CS/sql19cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/VB/sql19vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当键到期时，所有缓存对象都显式到期。

span.span: All cache objects are explicitly expired when the key is expired.

value.span: 一个键，它标识所有由 创建的缓存对象。

span.span: A key that identifies all cache objects created by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 缓存数据时， 方法从缓存而不是基础数据库中检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 缓存过期后， 方法从基础数据库中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 可以设置 属性，以便在 控件创建的所有缓存项与键之间创建依赖关系。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the control and the key. 通过使密钥过期，你可以通过编程方式随时终止所有缓存条目。You can programmatically expire all the cache entries at any time by expiring the key. 只有在 模式下， 控件才能缓存数据。The control can cache data only when in the mode. 如果 控件设置为 值并且还启用了缓存，则 方法会引发 异常。A exception is thrown by the method, if the control is set to the value and caching is also enabled. 将为 、和 属性的每个组合创建唯一的缓存条目。A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the , , and properties. 多 控件可以在控件从同一基础数据库加载相同数据的情况下使用相同的缓存条目。Multiple controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where the controls load the same data from the same underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 Microsoft Windows 身份验证下的客户端模拟时，将在第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果其他用户请求相同的数据，则从缓存中检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 通过对数据库进行另一次调用以验证用户对数据的访问权限，不会检索数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望有多个用户访问数据，并且希望数据库的安全配置验证每个数据的检索，请不要使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching.

summary.span: 获取或设置值，该值指示操作期间基础数据库中的一行数据更改时， 控件如何执行更新和删除。

span.span: Gets or sets the value indicating how the control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying database changes during the time of the operation.

value.span: 值之一。
默认为 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否向 `Update` 方法应用旧值和新值的参数。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 例如，如果 属性指定的命令返回一个 对象，其中的列 `Name` 和 `Number`，并且 属性设置为 值，则会为 `Name` 方法的 `Number` 和 `Update` 创建参数。For example, if the command that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number` and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果 属性设置为 值，则将为 `Name`、`Number`、`original_Name`和 `original_Number`创建参数。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. （原始值的参数的准确名称取决于 属性。）然后 控件确定 属性中指定的 `Update` 方法是否具有匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the property.) The control then determines if the `Update` method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是一种技术，当多个客户端访问和操作相同数据时，数据存储使用该技术来控制如何在存储区中读取和更改数据。Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一个客户端读取数据并向用户显示数据，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据，并将其呈现给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果这两个用户更新数据并将其提交到数据存储，则可能会发生一些意外的结果，因为这两个客户端可能会为同一数据更新不同的值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 这被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过将 属性设置为 值，`Update` 方法可以将旧值和新值与原始数据源进行比较，以检测冲突并根据需要对其进行处理。By setting the property to the value, your `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置特定于 ADO.NET 提供程序的连接字符串， 控件使用该字符串连接基础数据库。

span.span: Gets or sets the ADO.NET provider-specific connection string that the control uses to connect to an underlying database.

value.span: 用于连接到它所表示的 SQL 数据库的 .NET Framework 特定于数据访问接口的字符串。

span.span: A .NET Framework data provider-specific string that the uses to connect to the SQL database that it represents.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可用于各种 ADO.NET 提供程序，用于连接到基础数据源的连接字符串的语法特定于提供程序。The control can be used with a variety of ADO.NET providers and the syntax of the connection string that is used to connect to an underlying data source is specific to the provider. 配置 控件时，可以将 属性设置为数据库的类型（默认值为 ），并将 属性设置为包含连接到数据库所需的信息的连接字符串。When you configure a control, you set the property to the type of database (the default is ), and you set the property to a connection string that includes information that is required in order to connect to the database. 连接字符串的内容根据数据源控件所访问的数据库类型而有所不同。The contents of a connection string differ depending on what type of database the data source control is accessing. 例如，在连接到 SQL Server 时， 控件需要服务器名称、数据库（目录）名称以及有关如何对用户进行身份验证的信息。For example, the control requires a server name, database (catalog) name, and information about how to authenticate the user when connecting to a SQL Server. 有关连接字符串内容的信息，请参阅 类的 属性、 类的 属性、 类 属性或 类的 属性。For information about the contents of connection strings, see the property for the class, property for the class, property for the class, or the property for the class. 如果更改 属性，将引发 事件，从而导致绑定到 控件的任何控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the control to rebind. > [!IMPORTANT] > 有关存储连接字符串的信息，请参阅[如何：在使用数据源控件时保护连接字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178372(v=vs.100))。For information about storing a connection string, see [How To: Secure Connection Strings when Using Data Source Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178372(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置 属性以连接到 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库，并在 控件中显示 属性的结果。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a Microsoft SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. 第二个代码示例演示了更复杂的方案，其中 控件用于显示和更新受密码保护的 Microsoft Access 数据库中的数据。The second code example demonstrates a more complex scenario, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Microsoft Access database. 在每种情况下，首先显示 web.config 文件的 `connectionStrings` 元素，后跟包含 控件的 ASP.NET 页。In each case, the `connectionStrings` element of the Web.config file is shown first, followed by the ASP.NET page that contains the control. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性以连接到 SQL Server 数据库，并在 控件中显示 属性的结果。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to connect to a SQL Server database and display the results of the property in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/CS/sql3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_3sql/VB/sql3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了一个比前面的代码示例更复杂的方案，其中 控件用于显示和更新受密码保护的访问数据库中的数据。The following code example demonstrates a more complex scenario than the preceding code example, where a control is used to display and update data in a password-protected Access database. 由于 与 Access 一起使用，因此 属性设置为 提供程序， 属性设置为 UNC 共享访问数据库的相应连接字符串。Because the is used with Access, the property is set to the provider, and the property is set to an appropriate connection string for a UNC-shared Access database. 控件显示带有发货日期的订单。A control displays orders with shipment dates. 您可以通过选中相应的复选框，然后单击 "**更新**" 按钮来更新订单。You can update an order by checking the appropriate check box, and then clicking the **Update** button. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含纯文本格式的密码，仅用于说明目的。This example includes a password in plain text only for illustration purposes. 在生产应用程序中，应对包含密码的连接字符串进行加密。In a production application, connection strings that include passwords should be encrypted. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护连接信息](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md)。For more information, see [Protecting Connection Information](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/protecting-connection-information.md). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/CS/sql22cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_22sql/VB/sql22vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件获取数据所用的数据检索模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the data retrieval mode that the control uses to fetch data.

value.span: 值之一。
默认值为 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据检索模式标识 控件如何从基础数据库中检索数据。The data retrieval mode identifies how a control retrieves data from the underlying database. 如果 属性设置为 值，则会将数据加载到 对象中，并将其存储在服务器上的内存中。When the property is set to the value, data is loaded into a object and stored in memory on the server. 这会启用用户界面控件（如 ）提供排序、筛选和分页功能等方案。This enables scenarios where user interface controls, such as , offer sorting, filtering, and paging capabilities. 属性设置为 值时，数据由 对象检索，该对象是只进只读游标。When the property is set to the value, data is retrieved by a object, which is a forward-only, read-only cursor. 对象的特定类型取决于 使用的网络数据提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。The specific type of the object depends on the NET data provider that the uses, which is identified by the property. 默认情况下， 控件使用提供程序进行 Microsoft SQL Server、，数据读取器是 对象。By default, the control uses the provider for Microsoft SQL Server, the , and the data reader is a object. 如果更改 属性，将引发 事件，从而导致绑定到 的所有控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件的 属性设置为具有不需要排序、分页和筛选的 控件的方案的 值。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control to the value for a scenario with a control that requires no sorting, paging, nor filtering. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用 SQL 字符串和 集合中的所有参数执行删除操作。

span.span: Performs a delete operation using the SQL string and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 一个值，该值表示从基础数据库中删除的行数。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在执行删除操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件以检查参数的值，并在执行删除操作之前执行任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete operation. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 提供 方法是为了以编程方式访问 `Delete` 方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Delete` method. 如果 控件与数据绑定控件关联，数据绑定控件会自动调用**Delete**方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the **Delete** method. 方法委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 方法。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行该操作， 使用 文本和任何关联的 值生成 对象，然后对基础数据库执行 。To perform the operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 文本以删除 Northwind 数据库中的订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 最初，从 Orders 表中检索数据，并在 控件中显示数据。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 使用数据绑定控件（如 时），必须显式声明 属性，并调用 方法（不同于其他控件，例如 和 ，后者会自动填充参数并对数据源控件调用 方法）。You must explicitly declare the property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as the (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call the method on a data source control). 在此示例中，将 事件委托给专用 `OnDelete` 事件处理程序，该处理程序显式调用 控件的 方法。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

member this.DeleteCommand : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件从基础数据库删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to delete data from the underlying database.

value.span: 删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to delete data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，由 方法使用。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是参数化的查询或命令，则该参数的语法还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the syntax of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 （这是 类的默认提供程序），则将 `'@parameterName'`参数的语法。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the syntax of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果将提供程序设置为 或 ，则 `'?'`参数的占位符。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据库支持存储过程，则 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the database supports stored procedures. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全目的，不会将 属性存储在视图状态中。For security purposes, the property is not stored in view state. 由于可以对客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，因此在视图状态中存储有关数据库结构的敏感信息可能会导致信息泄露漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 文本以从 Northwind 数据库 Orders 表中删除订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table. 将从 Orders 表中检索数据，并在 控件中显示数据。Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 自动呈现**删除**按钮。The renders a **Delete** button automatically when the property is set to `true`. 此外，当单击 "**删除**" 按钮时， 控件会自动填充 集合并调用 方法。Additionally, when the **Delete** button is clicked, the control automatically populates the collection and calls the method. 最后，由于此代码示例删除数据，因此添加了一个事件处理程序，以便在执行 操作之前尝试将数据库备份到磁盘。Finally, because this code example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从与 控件相关联的 对象获取包含 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性包含参数化 SQL 查询，则 集合包含与 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的任何 对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. > [!NOTE] > 请确保绑定到 控件的数据绑定控件中没有 控件的名称与 集合中的任何参数名称都不匹配。Make sure that no controls in the data-bound control that you bind to the control have names that match any parameter names in the collection. 与绑定字段具有相同名称的参数将从 SQL 命令中排除，并且可能会导致 "未提供参数" 错误。Parameters that have the same name as bound fields are excluded from the SQL command, and a "parameter was not supplied" error might result. 如果 属性设置为 值，则将为数据的旧值和新值创建参数。If the property is set to the value, the parameters are created for both the old and new values of the data. 旧值的参数根据 属性进行命名。The parameters for the old values are named according to the property. 根据 ADO.NET 提供程序的不同， 集合中参数的顺序可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和 提供程序根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中的显示顺序来关联集合中的参数。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序是 控件的默认 ADO.NET 提供程序，它通过将参数名称与 SQL 查询中的占位符匹配来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 属性检索与 控件关联的 对象所包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 文本以删除 Northwind 数据库中的订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 最初，从 Orders 表中检索数据，并在 控件中显示数据。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 使用数据绑定控件（如 时，必须显式声明 属性，并调用 方法（与其他控件（如 和 ，后者会自动填充参数并对数据源控件调用 ）。You must explicitly declare property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as (unlike other controls, such as and , which automatically populate the parameters and call on a data source control). 在此示例中，将 事件委托给专用 `OnDelete` 事件处理程序，该处理程序显式调用 控件的 方法。In this example, the event is delegated to the private `OnDelete` event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleting As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 执行删除操作前发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化操作，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行删除操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 在调用事件处理程序委托时，与基础数据源的连接尚未打开。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您不能直接通过对 对象公开的 对象调用 方法来取消操作。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，通过将 对象的 属性设置为 `true`，可以取消数据库操作。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理发生 操作之前引发的 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event that is raised before a operation occurs. 由于此示例删除 Northwind 数据库中的数据，因此添加了 处理程序，以便在执行 操作之前尝试将数据库备份到磁盘。Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否启用数据缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has data caching enabled.

value.span: 如果为数据源控件启用数据缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 缓存数据时， 方法从缓存而不是基础数据库中检索数据。While data is cached, the method retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying database. 缓存过期后， 方法从基础数据库中检索数据，然后再次缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the underlying database, and then caches the data again. 当 属性设置为 `true`，并且 属性设置为大于0的值时， 控件将自动缓存数据，这表示缓存在检索新集之前存储数据的秒数。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before retrieving a fresh set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 Microsoft Windows 身份验证下的客户端模拟时，将在第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果其他用户请求相同的数据，则从缓存中检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 通过对数据库进行另一次调用以验证用户对数据的访问权限，不会检索数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望有多个用户访问数据，并且希望数据库的安全配置验证每个数据的检索，请不要使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索 Northwind 数据库中的数据，并在启用了数据缓存的情况下将其显示在 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control, with data caching enabled. 属性设置为 `true`， 设置为20秒。The property is set to `true` and the is set to 20 seconds. 由于默认情况下 属性设置为 字段，此页的用户每隔20秒就会看到最新数据。Because the property is set to the field by default, users of this page will see fresh data every 20 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/CS/sql18cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_18sql/VB/sql18vb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 表示使用 方法检索数据时应用的筛选表达式的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值是格式字符串表达式（由 方法处理的字符串），该表达式使用 集合中包含在字符串中的任何替换参数的值。The property value is a format string expression (a string that is processed by the method) that uses the values in the collection for any substitution parameters included in the string. 筛选表达式语法与 属性接受的语法相同，因为筛选器表达式应用于从执行 方法返回的 对象的 属性。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property, because the filter expression is applied to the property of the object that is returned from executing the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 如果将参数添加到 集合，则还可以在表达式中包含格式字符串占位符（例如，用来替换参数值的 `"{0}")`。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders (for example, `"{0}")` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 占位符根据 集合中参数的索引进行替换。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 如果 集合中的对象 `null`，则对象将被空字符串替换。If an object in the collection is `null`, the object will be replaced by an empty string. 可以在 属性中包含参数。You can include parameters in the property. 如果参数为字符串或字符类型，则将参数括在单引号内。If the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要引号。Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含为在 属性中找到的占位符计算的参数。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 仅当处于 模式时， 控件才支持筛选数据。The control supports filtering data only when in the mode. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库检索数据，并使用 字符串和 集合来筛选数据。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using a string and the collection. 只要执行 方法来检索数据，就会应用 属性。The property is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中， 包含筛选器参数的占位符，该参数包含在 集合中。In this example, the contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，filter 参数是绑定到 控件的 属性的 对象。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 由于 控件将其 属性设置为 `true`，因此，对 控件所做的任何更改都将导致该页将信息发布回服务器，并将 控件重新绑定到具有新筛选器的数据源控件。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection for the control causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件，以便在 控件执行筛选操作之前对筛选器参数值执行验证操作。Handle the event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the control performs a filter operation. 您可以通过将 对象的 属性设置为 `true`来取消 方法。You can cancel the method by setting the property of the object to `true`. 仅当设置了 属性时才引发事件。The event is raised only if the property is set. 事件委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 事件。The event delegates to the event of the object that is associated with the control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的参数与 属性中指定的任何参数相关联。The parameters in the collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the property. 调用 方法时， 属性中指定的参数占位符按顺序与 集合中的参数对象进行匹配。The parameter placeholders that are specified in the property are matched by order to parameter objects in the collection when the method is called. 属性检索与 控件关联的 对象所包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库检索数据，并使用 和 属性对数据进行筛选。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 只要执行 方法来检索数据，就会应用 控件的 属性。The property of the control is applied anytime the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中， 属性包含筛选器参数的占位符，该参数包含在 集合中。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，filter 参数是绑定到 控件的 属性的 对象。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 由于 控件将其 属性设置为 `true`，因此，对 选择的任何更改都将导致该页将信息发布回服务器，并将 控件重新绑定到具有新筛选器的数据源控件。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用 SQL 字符串和 集合中的所有参数执行插入操作。

span.span: Performs an insert operation using the SQL string and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 一个值，该值表示插入到基础数据库中的行数。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows inserted into the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在执行插入操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the insert operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件以检查参数的值，并在 操作之前执行任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before the operation. 若要执行插入操作， 对象将使用 文本和任何关联的 属性生成 对象，然后对基础数据库执行 对象。To perform an insert operation, the object builds an object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 提供 方法是为了以编程方式访问 `Insert` 方法。The method is provided for programmatic access to the `Insert` method. 如果 控件与数据绑定控件关联，数据绑定控件会自动调用 `Insert` 方法。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the data-bound control automatically calls the `Insert` method. 方法委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 方法。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件和简单的 Web 窗体页将数据插入到数据库中。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在 控件中。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 可以通过在 控件中输入值，然后单击 "**插入**" 按钮来添加新记录。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 单击 "**插入**" 按钮时，会将指定的值插入到数据库中，然后刷新 。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and then the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包括一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁，并且无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这也是潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 中访问数据](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件将数据插入基础数据库所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to insert data into the underlying database.

value.span: 插入数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to insert data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，由 方法使用。The represents either an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 （这是 类的默认提供程序），则参数的占位符是 `'@parameterName'`的。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果将提供程序设置为 或 ，则 `'?'`参数的占位符。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据源支持存储过程，则 可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 此属性委托给与 控件关联的 的 属性。This property delegates to the property of the that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全目的，未存储 属性是视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 由于可以对客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，因此在视图状态中存储有关数据库结构的敏感信息可能会导致信息泄露漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页将数据插入到数据库中。The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 第二个代码示例演示了如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据并在 控件中显示数据，以及如何使用 控件查看所选行在 控件中的详细信息，并将其作为插入新记录的窗体。The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row into the control and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 这些示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。These examples show how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 中访问数据](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件和简单的 Web 窗体页将数据插入到数据库中。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在 控件中。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 可以通过在 控件中输入值，然后单击 "**插入**" 按钮来添加新记录。You can add new records by entering values into the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 单击 "**插入**" 按钮时，会将指定的值插入到数据库中，并刷新 控件。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包括一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入（这是一个潜在的安全威胁），而将值插入到无验证的参数中，这也是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何从 SQL Server 检索数据并在 控件中显示数据，以及如何使用 控件查看 控件中选定行的详细信息，以及如何使用窗体来插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the control and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据显示在 控件中，并且 的选定行也显示在 控件中。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和 控件使用不同的数据源控件;与 关联的是 和 属性，这可确保显示 的选定行。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果单击 控件的自动生成的**插入**按钮，则 会显示一个不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储过程插入记录，并返回插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入一条记录，则 会自动使用绑定列中的值填充 集合，并调用 方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 当使用 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定语法时， 可以从任何 对象推断正确的参数，并从 对象推断参数。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，在 事件处理程序中添加了一个附加参数，用于处理存储过程返回的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，在 控件将数据插入到数据库中后，将调用 事件处理程序来处理 事件，插入行的主键的值将显示，并显式调用 控件的 方法来刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果单击 控件的自动生成的**插入**按钮，则 会显示一个不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储过程插入记录，并返回插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入一条记录，则 会自动使用绑定列中的值填充 集合，并调用 方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 当使用 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定语法时， 可以从任何 对象推断正确的参数，并从 对象推断参数。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，在 事件处理程序中添加了一个附加参数，用于处理存储过程返回的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，在 控件将数据插入到数据库中后，将调用 事件处理程序来处理 事件，并显示插入行的主键的值，并显式调用 控件的 方法来刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. summary.span: 执行插入操作前发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化操作，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行插入操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 在调用事件处理程序委托时，与基础数据源的连接尚未打开。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您不能直接通过对 属性公开的 对象调用 方法来取消操作。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the property. 但是，通过将 对象的 属性设置为 `true`，可以取消数据库操作。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据并在 控件中显示数据，以及如何使用 控件查看 中的选定行的详细信息，以及如何使用窗体来插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control and how to use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 中访问数据](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio). 最初，数据显示在 控件中，并且 的选定行也显示在 控件中。Initially, the data is displayed in the control, and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和 控件使用不同的数据源控件;与 关联的是 和 属性，这可确保显示 的选定行。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensures that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果单击 控件的自动生成的**插入**按钮，则 会显示一个不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储过程插入记录，并返回插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果插入一条记录，则 会自动使用绑定列中的值填充 集合，并调用 方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 当使用 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定语法时， 可以从任何 对象推断正确的参数，并为 推断参数。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，在 事件处理程序中添加了一个附加参数，用于处理存储过程返回的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，在 控件将数据插入到数据库中后，将调用 事件处理程序来处理 事件，并显示插入行的主键的值，并显式调用 控件的 `DataBind` 方法来刷新数据。Finally, after data is inserted into the database by the control, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the `DataBind` method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 从与 控件相关联的 对象获取包含 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索与 控件关联的 对象所包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 如果 属性包含参数化 SQL 查询，则 集合包含与 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的任何 对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根据 ADO.NET 提供程序的不同， 集合中参数的顺序可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和 提供程序根据参数出现在参数化 SQL 查询中的顺序，将集合中的参数关联起来。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序是 控件的默认 ADO.NET 提供程序，它通过在 SQL 查询中将参数的名称与占位符别名匹配来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件和简单的 Web 窗体页将数据插入到数据库中。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在 控件中。The current data in the Data table is displayed in the control. 可以通过在 控件中输入值，然后单击 "**插入**" 按钮来添加新记录。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 单击 "**插入**" 按钮时，会将指定的值插入到数据库中，并刷新 控件。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the control is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包括一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入（这是一个潜在的安全威胁），而将值插入到无验证的参数中，这也是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用声明性语法进行数据访问。This example shows how to use declarative syntax for data access. 有关如何使用代码而不是标记访问数据的信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 中访问数据](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio)。For information about how to access data by using code instead of markup, see [Accessing data in Visual Studio](/visualstudio/data-tools/accessing-data-in-visual-studio). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

member this.OldValuesParameterFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个格式字符串，该字符串应用于传递给 或 方法的所有参数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of any parameters that are passed to the or method.

value.span: 一个表示格式的字符串，该格式字符串应用于传递给 或 方法的所有 参数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any parameters passed to the or methods.

value.span: 默认值为“{0}”。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字符串仅应用于主键（如关联的数据绑定控件的 `DataKeyNames` 属性标识的主键），或在 属性设置为 值以及一组传递给相应数据方法的一组 `oldValues` 的 delete 和 update 方案中应用。The format string is applied only to primary keys, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the associated data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串将应用到 `oldValues` 集合中的每个参数名称。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 可以更改 属性的两个常见情况如下所示：Two common scenarios where you might change the property are as follows: - 区分更新中的旧值和新值。To differentiate between old and new values in updates. 属性设置为 值时，会将原始值和新值的参数添加到 集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 如果没有格式字符串，则将为每个数据字段创建两个具有相同名称的参数。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 通过更改原始值参数的名称，可以将数据与原始数据源进行比较，以检测冲突并比较键值。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 某些可视化设计器为原始值和键实现了特定的命名方案。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象添加的事件处理程序更新 并 值。The event handler that is added by the object updates the and values. 如果更新值，则会引发 事件，从而导致绑定到 控件的任何控件重新绑定。If the values are updated, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the control to rebind.
