summary.span: 获取或设置 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的名称， 控件使用该提供程序来连接基础数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .NET Framework data provider that the control uses to connect to an underlying data source.

value.span: 所使用的数据提供程序的名称；如果没有设置任何提供程序，则为 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the data provider that the uses; otherwise, the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server, if no provider is set.

value.span: 默认值为 Microsoft SQL Server 的 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称。

span.span: The default is the ADO.NET provider for Microsoft SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 包括以下数据访问接口：The .NET Framework includes the following data providers: - 提供程序是 SQL Server 的默认 .NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. - 提供程序是用于 OLE DB 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB. - 提供程序是 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC. - 提供程序是用于 Oracle .NET Framework 数据提供程序。The provider is the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle. 属性永远不会设置为非托管的 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称，如 `MSDAORA`。The property is never set to the name of an unmanaged ADO.NET provider, such as `MSDAORA`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 SqlDataSource 控件选择数据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1kdt8w2(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Selecting Data Using the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1kdt8w2(v=vs.100)). 如果更改 属性，将引发 事件，从而导致绑定到 的所有控件重新绑定。If you change the property, the event is raised, causing any controls that are bound to the to rebind. 在 Machine.config 文件的 `system.data` 部分的 `DbProviderFactories` 子节中指定了可用提供程序的列表。A list of available providers is specified in the `DbProviderFactories` subsection of the `system.data` section of the Machine.config file. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码演示了如何使用 控件的默认 .NET Framework 数据提供程序 SQL Server SQL Server 连接到数据库，该 。The first code demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server for the control, the . 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序（）连接到 ODBC 数据库。The second code example demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件的默认数据提供程序（）连接到 SQL Server 数据库。The following code example demonstrates how to connect to a SQL Server database using the default data provider for the control, the . 只要没有显式设置 属性，就会使用默认提供程序。Whenever the property is not explicitly set, the default provider is used. 属性是特定于提供程序的。The property is provider-specific. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/CS/sql1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1sql/VB/sql1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例在功能上与前面的代码示例相同，它演示了如何使用 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序（）连接到 ODBC 数据库。The following code example, which is functionally the same as the preceding code example, demonstrates how to connect to an ODBC database using the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, the . 属性设置为用于连接到 ODBC 数据库的 ODBC 数据源名称（DSN）的名称。The property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN) that is used to connect to the ODBC database. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/CS/odbc1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_1odbc/VB/odbc1vb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 用于请求对数据执行基本数据检索操作以外操作的 对象。

summary.span: 通过使用 SQL 字符串以及 集合中的任何参数，从基础数据库中检索数据。

span.span: Retrieves data from the underlying database by using the SQL string and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 一个数据行的 列表。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在页生命周期的 阶段，会自动调用 方法。The method is automatically called during the phase of the page life cycle. 它由已通过其 属性附加到 控件的数据绑定控件调用。It is called by data-bound controls that have been attached to a control through their property. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 方法返回 对象。The method returns a object if the property is set to the value. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 方法返回 对象。The method returns a object if the property is set to the value. 读取完数据后，关闭 的对象。Close the object when you have finished reading the data. 在执行 操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件以检查参数的值，并在 操作之前执行任何处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any processing before the operation. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 如果 属性设置为 并启用了缓存，则 对象在 操作期间从缓存中检索数据并将数据保存到缓存中。If the property is set to and caching is enabled, the object retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 缓存是根据 和 属性的组合指定的缓存行为来创建、丢弃或刷新的。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 Microsoft Windows 身份验证下的客户端模拟时，将在第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果其他用户请求相同的数据，则从缓存中检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 通过对数据库进行另一次调用以验证用户对数据的访问权限，不会检索数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望有多个用户访问数据，并且希望数据库的安全配置验证每个数据的检索，请不要使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval of data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. 如果 属性设置为 并指定了 属性，则使用任何提供的 属性计算筛选器表达式，并将生成的筛选器应用到 操作期间的数据列表。If the property is set to and a property has been specified, the filter expression is evaluated with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 方法委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 方法。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行数据检索操作， 使用 文本和任何关联的 值生成 对象，然后对基础数据库执行 。To perform a data retrieval operation, the builds a object by using the text and any associated values, and then executes the against the underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式调用 方法，并基于查询结果设置值。The following examples show how to programmatically call the method and set values based on the result of the query. 下面的示例演示 Web 控件的声明性代码。The following example shows the declarative code for the Web controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式调用 方法。The following example shows how to programmatically call the method. 控件返回整数。The control returns an integer. 整数的值用于设置 控件的文本并确定是否显示 控件。The value of the integer is used to set the text of a control and to determine whether to display a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectCommand { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SelectCommand : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件从基础数据库检索数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to retrieve data from the underlying database.

value.span: 一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称， 使用它检索数据。

span.span: An SQL string or the name of a stored procedure that the uses to retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称， 方法使用此属性从 SQL Server 数据库检索数据。The property represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method to retrieve data from a SQL Server database. 如果使用 Select 命令中的星号（\*）来选择所有列，并且如果使用自动代码生成来执行更新或删除操作，请确保名称中没有列包含空格。If you use an asterisk (\*) in the Select command to select all columns, and if you use automatic code generation to perform update or delete operations, make sure that no columns have spaces in their names. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 （这是 类的默认提供程序），则参数的占位符是 `'@parameterName'`的。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果将提供程序设置为 或 ，则 `'?'`参数的占位符。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据源支持存储过程，则 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全目的，未存储 属性是视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 由于可以对客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，因此在视图状态中存储有关数据库结构的敏感信息可能会导致信息泄露漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 文本设置为基本的 SQL 查询，以从与 ODBC 兼容的数据库中检索数据并将其显示在 控件中。The first code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. 第二个代码示例演示如何将 文本设置为存储过程的名称，并将 属性设置为 值，以便从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并将其显示在 控件中。The second code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 在这两个示例中，无需显式调用 方法，因为通过 属性附加到数据源控件的数据绑定控件将在 阶段自动调用 方法。In both examples, there is no need to explicitly call the method because the data-bound controls that are attached to the data source control through the property will automatically call the method during the phase. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 文本设置为基本的 SQL 查询，以从与 ODBC 兼容的数据库中检索数据并将其显示在 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from an ODBC-compliant database and display it in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc/CS/odbc4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_4odbc/VB/odbc4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将 文本设置为存储过程的名称，并将 属性设置为 值，以便从 SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并将其显示在 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 如果数据源支持存储过程，则 属性可以是 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/CS/sql14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/VB/sql14vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 文本设置为存储过程的名称，并将 属性设置为 值，以便从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并将其显示在 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure and the property to the value, in order to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件，以在数据检索操作完成后检查输出参数的值。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after a data retrieval operation has completed. 输出参数可从与事件关联的 对象中获取。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化操作，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行选择操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the select operation. 从与事件关联的 对象中提供了 select 参数。The select arguments are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 从与 控件相关联的 对象获取包含 属性所使用的参数的参数集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the property from the object that is associated with the control.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性包含参数化 SQL 查询，则 集合包含与 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的任何 对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根据 ADO.NET 提供程序的不同， 集合中参数的顺序可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和 提供程序根据参数出现在参数化 SQL 查询中的顺序，将集合中的参数关联起来。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序是 控件的默认 ADO.NET 提供程序，它通过在 SQL 查询中将参数的名称与占位符别名匹配来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 属性检索与 控件关联的 对象所包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何通过将 属性设置为 SQL 查询，在 Microsoft SQL Server 中从 Northwind 数据库检索数据。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server by setting the property to an SQL query. SQL 查询已参数化，并且 属性中的占位符与添加到 集合的 对象匹配。The SQL query is parameterized and the placeholder in the property is matched to the object that is added to the collection. 绑定 的 控件充当 控件中显示的内容的筛选器。The control, which the is bound to, acts as a filter for what is displayed in the control. 有关可以使用的其他类型参数的信息，请参阅 类概述。For information about other types of parameters you can use, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 由于参数在 WHERE 子句中使用，因此，在代码示例中使用 属性的功能等效于使用 和 属性。Because the parameter is used in a WHERE clause, the use of the property in the code example is functionally equivalent to using the and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置存储过程参数的名称，在使用存储过程执行数据检索时，该存储过程参数用于对检索到的数据进行排序。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a stored procedure parameter that is used to sort retrieved data when data retrieval is performed using a stored procedure.

value.span: 在使用存储过程执行数据检索时用于排序检索数据的存储过程参数的名称。

span.span: The name of a stored procedure parameter used to sort retrieved data when data retrieval is performed using a stored procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性包含的 SQL 命令是存储过程的名称时，才计算 属性。The property is evaluated only when the SQL command that is contained by the property is the name of a stored procedure. 在这种情况下，如果设置 属性，它将包含用于对存储过程的结果进行排序的参数的名称。In this case, if the property is set, it contains the name of a parameter that is used to sort the results of the stored procedure. 如果设置 属性，则该属性将预置到 属性中。If the property is set, it is prepended to the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个用分号分隔的字符串，指示用于 Microsoft SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

value.span: 一个字符串，指示用于 SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: A string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the SQL Server cache dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持基于数据缓存的 对象的可选过期策略（必须为数据库服务器配置服务）。The control supports an optional expiration policy based on the object for the data cache (the service must be configured for the database server). 字符串根据 `@ Page` 指令使用的相同格式标识数据库和表，其中字符串的第一部分是 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库的连接字符串，后跟一个冒号分隔符，最后是数据库表的名称（例如 `"connectionstring1:table1"`）。The string identifies databases and tables according to the same format that is used by the `@ Page` directive, where the first part of the string is a connection string to a Microsoft SQL Server database, followed by a colon delimiter, and finally the name of the database table (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1"`). 如果 属性依赖于多个表，则连接字符串和表名称对由分号分隔（例如，`"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`）。If the property depends on more than one table, the connection string-and-table name pairs are separated by semicolons (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`). > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 Microsoft Windows 身份验证下的客户端模拟时，将在第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Microsoft Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果其他用户请求相同的数据，则从缓存中检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 通过对数据库进行另一次调用以验证用户对数据的访问权限，不会检索数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望有多个用户访问数据，并且希望数据库的安全配置验证每个数据的检索，请不要使用缓存。If you expect more than one user to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the security configurations for the database, do not use caching. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 SQL Server 的缓存依赖项，以及如何设置 控件的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a control. 在此示例中，数据库每120秒轮询一次。In this example, the database is polled every 120 seconds. 如果在该时间内 Northwind 商贸 Employees 表中的数据发生更改，则由 控件缓存并由 控件显示的任何数据将在下一次轮询数据库时由 控件进行刷新。If the data in the Northwind Traders Employees table changes during that time, any data that is cached by the control and displayed by the control is refreshed by the control the next time the database is polled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql/CS/sql23cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_23sql/VB/sql23vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用 SQL 字符串和 集合中的所有参数执行更新操作。

span.span: Performs an update operation using the SQL string and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 一个值，该值表示基础数据库中被更新的行数。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows updated in the underlying database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据已更改，则在回发期间 、和 控件会自动调用 方法。The method is automatically called by the , , and controls during postback if the data has been changed. 对于在其他控件中已更改的数据，可以在 事件期间，在回发时显式调用 方法。For data that has been changed in other controls, the method can be explicitly called on postback during the event. 在执行 操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件以检查参数的值，并在 操作之前执行任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing. 方法委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 方法。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. 若要执行更新操作， 使用 文本和任何关联的 属性生成 对象，然后对基础数据库执行 对象。To perform an update operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 控件在 控件中显示数据，并在单击 "**提交**" 按钮时更新数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 第二个代码示例演示如何显示从 控件的 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索的数据，以及如何使用 控件更新记录。The second code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件在 控件中显示数据，并在单击 "**提交**" 按钮时更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 使用参数化 SQL 语句设置 属性，并将两个 参数添加到 集合。The property is set with a parameterized SQL statement, and two parameters are added to the collection. 单击 "**提交**" 按钮时，将处理 事件，以显式调用 方法。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从 控件的 SQL Server 数据库中检索的数据，以及如何使用 控件更新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何使用 对象在使用 控件更新数据时添加事务上下文。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件更新基础数据库中的数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the control uses to update data in the underlying database.

value.span: 更新数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，由 方法使用。The represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the method. 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序是 （这是 类的默认提供程序），则参数的占位符是 `'@parameterName'`的。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果将提供程序设置为 或 ，则 `'?'`参数的占位符。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 如果数据源支持存储过程，则 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 属性委托给与 控件关联的 对象的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 出于安全目的，未存储 属性是视图状态。For security purposes, the property is not stored is view state. 由于可以对客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，因此在视图状态中存储有关数据库结构的敏感信息可能会导致信息泄露漏洞。Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 控件设置 控件的 属性以及更新 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中的数据。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a Microsoft SQL Server database using the control. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 控件更新 ODBC 数据库中的数据。The second code example demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件设置 控件的 属性以及更新 SQL Server 数据库中的数据。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a SQL Server database using the control. 会自动填充 集合、从 对象推断参数，并在选择可编辑 上的**更新**链接时调用 方法。The automatically populates the collection, inferring the parameters from the objects, and calls the method when the **Update** link on the editable is selected. 此示例还包括一些后期处理：更新记录后，将发送一封通知电子邮件。This example also includes some post-processing: after a record is updated, a notification email message is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/CS/sql7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/VB/sql7vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例在功能上与前面的代码示例相同，演示了如何使用 控件更新 ODBC 数据库中的数据。The following code example, which is functionally identical to the preceding code example, demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 设置为 ODBC 的 ADO.NET 提供程序、和 属性设置为 ODBC 数据源名称（DSN）的名称。The is set to the ADO.NET provider for ODBC, the , and the property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件，以便在更新操作完成后检查输出参数的值。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an update operation has completed. 输出参数可从与事件关联的 对象中获取。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示和更新从 控件中的 ODBC 数据库检索的数据。The following code example demonstrates how to display and update data that is retrieved from an ODBC database in a control. 成功更新记录后，事件处理程序将处理 事件，以执行在其中发送电子邮件通知的后处理步骤。After a record is successfully updated, the event is handled by an event handler to perform a post-processing step where an email notification is sent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性包含参数化 SQL 查询，则 集合包含与 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的任何 对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 参数名称可能会受到 属性的影响，尤其是在名称标识主键（如使用数据绑定控件的 `DataKeyNames` 属性指定的键）时，或在 属性设置为 值以及将一组传递给相应数据方法的一组 `oldValues` 的删除和更新方案中。Parameter names might be affected by the property, specifically if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key specified using the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串将应用到 `oldValues` 集合中的每个参数名称。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 集合中参数的顺序可能很重要，具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序。The order of the parameters in the collection might be important, depending on the ADO.NET provider. 和 提供程序根据参数出现在参数化 SQL 查询中的顺序，将集合中的参数关联起来。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序是 控件的默认 ADO.NET 提供程序，它通过在 SQL 查询中将参数的名称与占位符别名匹配来关联集合中的参数。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[将参数与 SqlDataSource 控件一起使用](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100))。For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z72eefad(v=vs.100)). 属性检索与 控件关联的 对象所包含的 属性。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件在 控件中显示数据，并在单击 "**提交**" 按钮时更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 使用参数化 SQL 语句设置 ，并将两个 参数添加到 集合。The is set with a parameterized SQL statement and two parameters are added to the collection. 单击 "**提交**" 按钮时，将处理 事件，以显式调用 方法。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包括一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入（这是一个潜在的安全威胁），而将值插入到无验证的参数中，这也是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat, and values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is also a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 执行更新操作前发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化操作，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行更新操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 在调用事件处理程序委托时，与基础数据源的连接尚未打开。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您不能通过对 对象公开的 对象调用 方法来直接取消 数据库操作。Therefore, you cannot directly cancel the database operation by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 不过，您可以通过将 的 属性设置为 `true`，取消数据库操作。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 无需验证即可将值插入到参数中，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat. 使用 事件来验证参数值，然后再执行查询。Use the event to validate parameter values before executing the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从 控件的 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索的数据，以及如何使用 控件更新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何使用 对象在使用 控件更新数据时添加事务上下文。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]
